div.div: Sunny, with a high near 68. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 43. West wind 5 to 10 mph becoming west 10 to 15 mph after midnight.
A 50 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 63. Breezy, with a northwest wind 15 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
